messages.content: Create sql queries base on plaintext and output the results of the queries
SELECT Email FROM professors WHERE P_name= 'Dawn Hart';
Create sql queries base on plaintext and output the results of the queries
Where is Sai Mukavilli's office loacted
SELECT Building,O_num FROM mydb.professors WHERE P_name='Sai Mukkavilli';
Sai Mukkavilli's office is located in Crawford Wheatley with offcie number 203
Create sql queries base on plaintext and output the results of the queries
What are Johnathan Hobbs office hours?
SELECT Begin_O_hrs, End_O_hrs, day_of_week FROM mydb.professors WHERE P_name='Johnathan Hobbs';
Johnathan Hobbs's office hours are from 11 to 3:30 on Tuesdays and Thursdays
